sentences.en: And mind you don't make a hash of it!
At each offset in the file the 32 - bit rolling checksum and its 16 - bit hash are calculated.
sentences.cn: 文件中的每个偏移都会被计算32-bit的滚动校验和及它的16-bit的hash值.

sentences.en: Copies the contained elements, hash function, predicate, maximum load factor and allocator.
sentences.cn: 复制所含的元素 、 散列函数 、 谓词 、 最大负载因子和分配器.

sentences.en: Hash algorithms are very important functions in computer security.
sentences.cn: 散列算法对计算机安全起着举足轻重的作用.

sentences.en: I made a hash o'this cruise, did I?
sentences.cn: 你们说我把这次航行搞得一团糟, 是不是?

sentences.en: JULES -- okay now , tell me about the hash bars?
sentences.cn: 朱尔斯:——那么,那些地下酒吧 呢 ?

sentences.en: Nevertheless, like all hash tables, its performance depends on the distribution of hashes.
sentences.cn: 不仅如此, 像所有的hash表, 其性能依赖于哈希分布.

sentences.en: She could choose one who would not make a hash of things.
sentences.cn: 她可以选择一位不会把事情弄糟的人.
那句话说得他哑口无言.

sentences.en: The teacher asked them to sit down together and hash out their differences.
sentences.cn: 教师要他们坐下讨论讨论以消除分歧.

sentences.en: Watson had made a thorough hash of it.
sentences.cn: 沃森把这事儿弄得一团糟。

sentences.en: We sit down to a supper of corned - beef hash or some other modest fare.
sentences.cn: 我们坐下来吃一顿咸牛肉或其他菜式素净的晚饭.

sentences.en: What is a croquette but hash that have come to a head?
sentences.cn: 油炸肉酱薯饼是什么,不是化了脓的肉丁烤菜 吗 ?

sentences.en: When you make meatball you must hash ( up ) meat.
sentences.cn: 做肉 丸子 时,你一定要把肉切碎.

sentences.en: You've made a terrible hash of that painting.
